summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3680 , for the improvement of University Street, from 1st Avenue to Railroad Avenue; by the construction of a pile bridge and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45349 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
